newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Lonsum Q1 net up to 20.81 bln rupiah.
newsitem.headline: Lonsum Q1 net up to 20.81 bln rupiah.

text.p: Indonesian plantation firm PT PP London Sumatra Indonesia (Lonsum) said on Wednesday it posted a net profit of 20.81 billion rupiah in the first quarter of 1997 against 15.98 billion rupiah in the year-ago period.
Lonsum said total revenues fell to 44.48 billion rupiah in the first quarter of 1997, however, from 47.16 billion rupiah in the same period last year.
The planatation firm said in a statement that the higher net profit was attributed to an increase in non-operating income.
